title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you create tasks so that you can focus on completing them.

title: Portfolio Website
description: That's this website built in Python to showcase coding projects and apps that I'm working on and towards completing.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from structured Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Good News
description: A website that gets data from a news API and uses sentiment analysis to publish only positive news.

title: Climate Change API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities, and to analyze the data to calculate the rate of climate change.

title: Download's Folder Cleaner
description: A script that monitors the Downloads folder and deletes old files keeping the folder clean.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic. (The focal point being sustainability.)

title: Open Domain Chatbot
description: A chatbot built that can discuss anything with a human and is built using the Facebook API.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Typing Analyzer
description: A program that monitors the computer keyboard and returns the most typed words of the session.

title: Internet Speed Analysis
description: A program that records the internet speed every few seconds and plots the values on the browser.

title: Monitoring Data
description: A program that monitors particular websites and periodically records the data to a remote server.

title: Visualizing Data
description: A program that visualizes the data collected from some of the more trusted sources utilized in the monitoring program.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city, compared the same day of the previous years, and forcast for the years to come.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: School Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing complex university data with an SQL database backend.

title: Restaurateur
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability, while highlighting the eco-friendly options.

title: Online Store
description: A Django online store app where users can place orders directly with sustainable products from sellers who are transparent about their sustainability practices.
